item.title: 人权组织称肯尼亚教唆绑架外国持不同政见者
item.description: 在乌干达一名反对派领导人上周被带走之后，人权组织指责肯尼亚在引渡政治反对派方面与外国势力勾结的 "模式"。【原文：Human rights groups accused Kenya of a “pattern” of collaborating with foreign powers over the rendition of political opponents, after a Ugandan opposition leader was taken last week.】

item.title: 苹果竞争对手 OPPO 寄望中国以外市场实现新增长
item.description: 中国智能手机制造商 OPPO 正在推动海外增长，以寻求新的收入来源，因为其国内市场正面临经济放缓和激烈竞争的困境。【原文：Chinese smartphone maker Oppo is pushing for overseas growth, seeking new revenue streams as its home market struggles with a slowing economy and intense competition.】

item.title: 清空公司在机场的主导地位可能即将终结
item.description:
这家科技公司现在已成为美国机场安检部门的一个 事实上的分支机构，但却面临着与 TSA、机场和客户之间的问题。【原文：

The tech company that’s now a de facto arm of US airport security has faced issues with the TSA, airports and customers.

】

item.title: 匈牙利在与乌克兰边境附近部署防空系统
item.description: 匈牙利计划将新购置的防空系统转移到与乌克兰接壤的边境附近，以应对俄罗斯对乌克兰战争升级可能造成的影响。【原文：Hungary plans to shift newly acquired air-defense systems close to its border with Ukraine as it braces for potential fallout from the escalation in Russia’s war on Ukraine.】

item.title: 渣打银行中国区杠杆融资主管萨姆即将离职
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，渣打银行大中华区和北亚地区杠杆融资、收购融资和私人信贷主管 Vivian Sam 将离职。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc.’s head of leveraged, acquisition finance and private credit for Greater China and North Asia, Vivian Sam, will be leaving the bank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 低风速加剧寒流，英国电价涨幅扩大
item.description: 由于寒冷天气刺激了供暖需求，而风力发电量将大幅下降，英国当日电力价格连续第二个交易日上涨。【原文：UK day-ahead power prices rose for a second session, with frigid weather boosting demand for heating and wind generation set to plunge.】

item.title: 南非称食物中毒是国家灾难
item.description: 在至少 22 名儿童死亡后，南非宣布一连串食物中毒事件为国家灾难。【原文：South Africa declared a spate of food poisonings a national disaster, following the death of at least 22 children.】

item.title: 斯塔默呼吁清除繁文缛节后，英国将批准更多交易
item.description: 在英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）呼吁监管机构削减繁文缛节以刺激经济增长之后，英国竞争监管机构正在研究在不损害消费者利益的情况下，以不同方式批准更多交易。【原文：The UK’s competition watchdog is looking at different ways it can clear more deals without harming consumers, after Prime Minister Keir Starmer called on regulators to cut red tape to spur growth.】

item.title: Citadel Securities 将招聘国家主管和交易员以推动印度市场发展
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Citadel Securities LLC 计划为其印度业务招聘一名主管，并增加更多的交易员，因为这家做市商巨头正在扩大其在全球最大股票市场之一的业务。【原文：Citadel Securities LLC plans to hire a head for its India operations and add more traders, according to people familiar with the matter, as the market-making giant expands its presence in one of the largest equity markets globally.】

item.title: PAG 据称将以 68 亿美元出售 Airpower 工业气体部门
item.description: 亚洲最大的另类资产管理公司之一 PAG 同意将 Airpower Technologies Ltd. 的工业气体业务出售给一家中国财团，交易价值 68 亿美元。【原文：PAG, one of Asia’s biggest alternative asset managers, agreed to sell the industrial gases business of Airpower Technologies Ltd. to a Chinese consortium in a deal valued at $6.8 billion, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普关税威胁欧盟，Pictet 将英国视为债券避风港
item.description: 欧洲最大的资产管理公司之一对英国债券持乐观态度，称在唐纳德-特朗普开始第二次担任美国总统后，英国债券的表现将远远好于欧元区同类债券。【原文：One of Europe’s biggest asset managers is upbeat on UK bonds, saying they will perform much better than euro-area peers after the start of Donald Trump’s second stint as US president.】

item.title: 在经济低迷时期，百度销售额出现两年来最大跌幅
item.description: 在中国经济萎靡不振削弱了百度在人工智能领域的发展后，百度公司创下了两年多来最大的营收降幅。【原文：Baidu Inc. recorded its biggest revenue drop in more than two years after China’s economic malaise undermined its push into generative AI.】

item.title: 奇人 Arne Westad 谈中国如何首次加入全球资本主义经济
item.description:
后毛泽东时代改革的真正起源

The true origin of the post-Mao reforms

】

item.title: 奇货可居：Wested 谈中国如何加入全球资本主义（播客）
item.description: 中国是如何成为今天的经济巨人的？其中一个关键时刻显然是加入世贸组织。在此之前，邓小平领导的改革时代显然至关重要。但显然，没有任何一个事件或转折点能真正说明问题。在一本开创性的新书— 伟大的变革：中国从革命到改革之路》一书中，历史学家奥德-阿尔内-韦斯特德和陈健讲述了中国如何从一个贫困的、高度计划化的社区，发展成为一个拥有巨大发展潜力的国家的完整故事。【原文：How did China become the economic behemoth that it is today? One pivotal moment was, obviously, it’s ascension into the WTO. Prior to that, the era of reform under Deng Xiaoping was obviously crucial. But obviously no single event or turning point can really tell the story. In a groundbreaking new book — The Great Transformation: China’s Road from Revolution to Reform — historians Odd Arne Westad and Chen Jian tell the full story of how China went from being an impoverished, highly planned commu】

item.title: 中国誓言加强重要生物技术中心的基因治疗研究
item.description: 中国已承诺鼓励在位于中国东部城市苏州的生物技术中心开展更多基因和细胞疗法研究，这是中国为巩固其在全球药物研究最前沿的地位所做的最新努力。【原文：China has pledged to encourage more research in gene and cell therapies at the country’s biotech hub in the eastern Chinese city of Suzhou, in the latest bid to bolster the country’s standing at the cutting edge of global drug research.】

item.title: Quant Mutual 基金的阿达尼大赌注因贿赂指控而变味
item.description: 阿达尼企业有限公司（Adani Enterprises Ltd.）最大的支持者之一所下的看涨赌注看起来很脆弱，因为该公司董事长被美国起诉导致其股价暴跌。【原文：Bullish wagers by one of Adani Enterprises Ltd.’s biggest backers are looking vulnerable, following its shares’ tumble caused by the US indictment of its chairman.】

item.title: 美国起诉后，印度反对党要求逮捕阿达尼
item.description: 在美国检察官起诉亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼承诺向南亚国家政府官员行贿后，印度主要反对党要求对其商业交易进行调查。【原文：India’s main opposition party sought an investigation into business dealings of billionaire Gautam Adani after US prosecutors indicted the tycoon for promising bribes to the South Asian nation’s government officials.】

item.title: 中国经纪商富途全球扩张放缓，裁员 5
item.description: 中国在线经纪商富途控股有限公司（Futu Holdings Ltd.）正在裁员约 5%，以重新评估公司的全球扩张战略。【原文：China’s online brokerage Futu Holdings Ltd. is reducing its headcount by about 5% as it reassesses the firm’s strategy to expand globally.】

item.title: 日本央行上田表示下一次会议将在不确定结果的情况下举行
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫给出了迄今为止最明确的暗示，即央行下一次货币政策会议将就是否加息进行现场讨论。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda gave the clearest hint yet that the central bank’s next monetary policy meeting will involve a live discussion over whether to raise interest rates.】

item.title: 阿达尼市场波动后，韦丹塔暂停债券销售计划
item.description: 印度亿万富翁阿尼尔-阿加瓦尔（Anil Agarwal）控制的韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）正在重新评估可能出售美元债券的时机，此前美国对独立企业集团阿达尼集团（Adani Group）创始人的起诉加剧了市场波动。【原文：Vedanta Resources Ltd., controlled by Indian billionaire Anil Agarwal, is reassessing timing for a potential sale of dollar bonds, after a US indictment of the founder of separate conglomerate Adani Group fueled market volatility, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 阿达尼驳斥美国关于贿赂计划的指控毫无根据
item.description: 阿达尼集团否认了美国检察官对其亿万富翁创始人高塔姆-阿达尼及其助手参与推动一项超过 2.5 亿美元的贿赂计划以赢得印度太阳能合同的指控。【原文：The Adani Group denied US prosecutors’ charge that its billionaire founder Gautam Adani and his aides were involved in driving a more than $250 million bribery scheme to win Indian solar energy contracts.】

item.title: 法国商界大选阴霾笼罩前景
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）在 6 月份对临时大选进行了一场命运多舛的赌博，这使法国企业陷入了长期的阴霾，也为总统七年来将法国转变为投资中心的努力蒙上了阴影。【原文：Emmanuel Macron’s ill-fated June gamble on snap elections has plunged French businesses into prolonged gloom, clouding the president’s seven-year effort to transform the country into a hub for investment.】

item.title: 经济学家称印尼降息可能更慢、更浅
item.description: 据经济学家称，由于全球不确定性使印尼盾的稳定性面临风险，印尼央行可能会放慢基准利率的下调速度并减少下调次数。【原文：Bank Indonesia is likely to pursue slower and fewer cuts to its benchmark interest rate as global uncertainties put rupiah stability at risk, according to economists.】

item.title: 马里在达成 1.6 亿美元交易后释放了 Resolute Mining 公司首席执行官霍洛汉
item.description: Resolute Mining Ltd. 首席执行官特里-霍洛汉（Terry Holohan）和另外两名员工已从马里的拘留所获释，就在几天前，这家金矿开采公司同意支付约 1.6 亿美元，以解决与马里政府的税务纠纷。【原文：Resolute Mining Ltd. said Chief Executive Officer Terry Holohan and two other employees have been released from detention in Mali, just days after the gold mining company agreed to pay about $160 million to resolve a tax dispute with the government.】

item.title: 挪威经济实现2022年以来最快增长，令人惊喜
item.description: 挪威上一季度经济加速增长，达到近两年来的最快速度，这支持了挪威央行将在第一季度开始放宽借贷成本的预期。【原文：Norway’s economy accelerated last quarter to its fastest pace in almost two years, backing expectations that the nation’s central bank will begin easing borrowing costs in the first quarter.】

item.title: 印度央行为外汇政策辩护：印度试图规避全球风险
item.description: 印度中央银行表示，印度正努力保持货币稳定，以确保经济免受全球溢出效应和金融稳定风险的影响。【原文：India is trying to keep its currency stable to ensure the economy is insulated from global spillovers and financial stability risks, according to the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 泰晤士水务公司被禁止使用客户现金支付奖金
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司将被禁止从客户手中收回去年支付给其老板的 77 万英镑（973,670 美元）奖金。【原文：Thames Water will be blocked from clawing back from customers £770,000 ($973,670) in bonuses paid to its bosses last year.】

item.title: 寻找关税避风港？英国股市或许正是如此
item.description: 当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的贸易威胁令欧洲股市动荡不安，但有一个市场角落看起来相对安全，那就是英国。【原文：As European equities are roiled by President-elect Donald Trump’s trade threats, there’s one corner of the market that looks relatively insulated — Britain.】

item.title: 谁是高塔姆-阿达尼，美国为何指控他行贿？
item.description: 高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）是亚洲最富有的人之一，去年他的财富一度仅次于埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）。现在，他作为亚洲第二富豪的地位受到了威胁，因为美国检察官在 11 月指控他涉嫌行贿，引发了他旗下公司股票的暴跌。2023 年初，纽约投资者兴登堡研究公司（Hindenburg Research）指控阿达尼集团存在股票操纵和会计欺诈行为，阿达尼的财富受到打击。【原文：Gautam Adani is one of Asia’s richest men and at one point last year was second in wealth in the world only to Elon Musk. Now, his spot as Asia’s second-richest person is under threat after US prosecutors charged him in November with suspected bribery, triggering a rout in the stocks of his companies. Adani’s fortunes took a hit in early 2023 after allegations of stock manipulation and accounting fraud at his Adani Group were made by the New York-based investor Hindenburg Research, which at the】

item.title: 比特币创纪录上涨，美国 ETF 资产飙升至逾 1000 亿美元
item.description: 直接投资于比特币的美国交易所交易基金的总资产超过了 1000 亿美元，因为这种原始加密货币延续了破纪录的涨势。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing directly in Bitcoin surpassed $100 billion in total assets as the original cryptocurrency extended a record-breaking rally.】
